features: 【Heavy Duty Camera Tripod 】With its durable aluminum alloy construction, this camera tripod guarantees stability and long-lasting performance, which can hold up to 15 pounds and weighs 2.85 pounds. Load-bearing hook and Non-slip rubber feet design, greater ground friction, more stable. Heavy Duty Tripod can meets all your photography and videography needs.

【360° Rotation & 3-Way Tripod Head】Camera tripod with a pan-and-tilt head can be 360° panoramic shooting, You'll be able to capture stunning panoramic shots or smoothly track moving subjects with ease. 180°up and down shooting, and a 90°vertical portrait by a rotatable handle that can control smooth movement. No matter if it's landscape photography, portrait shots, or even selfies, this tripod has got you covered.

【Tripod for Camera Phone Tablet】Whether you're using a camera, phone, or tablet, our tripod has got you covered. Camera tripod has a standard 1/4" screw mount, compatible with Nikon, Canon, DSLR, SLR, action cameras, other digital cameras, projectors, spotting scopes, ring light, and camcorders. 2-in-1 phone holder compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 11 Pro/XS/XR/MAX... Samsung Galaxy S10 Plus /S10/S9/S8 /Note 8, iPad Pro 9.7"/10.5"/ 11", and iPad Mini

【Adjustable Travel Tripod】67 Inches Camera tripod has four column legs with three quick-release flip-lock knob for fast extension from 20 inches to 67 inches. It's fully adjustable, allowing you to customize the height and angle to suit your specific needs. When you're ready to travel, simply fold it down and stow it away in the included travel carry bag.

【Wireless Remote Tripod】Phone stand tripod with remote allows you to capture photos or start recording videos from a distance of 33 ft/10 m, making it ideal for group shots, vlogs, and self-portraits. Camera phone tripod is suitable for watching videos, recording life, live streaming, vlogging, taking selfies, group photos, family photos, parties, hiking, sports, YouTube, video conferencing, and online meetings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JOILCAN Camera Tripod, Heavy Duty Camera Tripod: Designed to provide stability and support for your camera during every shot. With its durable aluminum alloy construction and stable 3-way tripod head, this camera tripod offers superior support for your camera, allowing you to capture stunning, professional-quality images.

360° Rotation & 3-Way Tripod Head Whether you're a professional photographer or an amateur enthusiast, this tripod is perfect for you. Its 360° rotation and 3-way tripod head provide unparalleled flexibility, allowing you to effortlessly capture shots from any angle. No matter if it's landscape photography, portrait shots, or even selfies, this tripod has got you covered.

Wireless Remote Phone Tripod The wireless remote allows you to capture photos or start recording videos from a distance, making it ideal for group shots, vlogs, and self-portraits. Capture shots from a distance with the convenient wireless remote, ensuring that you're always in control of your camera. Don't let distance limit your creativity. Take full control of your camera without worrying about blurry shots or awkward angles.
Professional Tripod for Cameras / Cellphones / Tablets / Lasers / Spotting Scopes / Projectors
Aluminum Phone Tripod for Video Recording Photo Vlogging
Travel Aluminum Tripod, Recording your Wonderful Moments Of Trip...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect tripod for the rest of us!
reviews.reviewText: I can only echo what so many of the other positive reviews have already identified. Sturdy but light! *Articulated* rubber feet that help to keep the tripod stable and level. Speaking of… there is an incorporated bubble level near the mounting platform to assist in making the tripod level. There is a carry handle incorporated into the central tube that flexes flat and out of the way when not used. A hook at the bottom to hang a bag or add more weight for added stability. Two mounting plates for quick switching of devices. Bluetooth remote! Device holder is versatile by allowing both sides to be used for different sized devices. The list is almost interminable. I will say that contrary to another reviewer I had no problem leaving the head joint and adjustment handle attached and just folding it out of the way to make it fit in the included carry bag.This tripod is an amazing value for less than $30 and well worthy of it! Very highly recommend to anyone that is not in need of the highest professional requirements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Budget Tripod
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As a social media content creator, I've gone through two tripods that simply didn't meet my needs. This tripod, my third ever tripod, is the best one I've ever owned! It is such a game-changer! It came with quite a few parts and bonus accessories, which were an unexpected surprise for me. What's even more outstanding is that it only cost me $25. Here are some of the things I love about it:-It is durable and sturdy. Its legs are made of good quality aluminum, and not plastic! It feels very substantial, and will definitely be able to hold heavier cameras without tipping over. But just in case your camera is on the bulkier side, it has a hook on the bottom, that allows you to anchor it down with something heavy. The tripod also came with additional rubber feet, that can be easily screwed on for better grip and stability.-I love that I can easily switch between devices! So it came with 2 quick-release plates. You basically attach your device to the quick plate. So it makes it very easy to switch between 2 devices without having to screw on said device every time you want to switch.-I love the remote bluetooth clicker. It is very responsive and works like a charm. Perfect for when you are taking solo shots.-I purchased this tripod with an upcoming overseas trip in mind. The head with the lever screwed on, cannot fit the carrying bag (you'd have to unscrew the parts first), so I plan on leaving that home, and just screwing on my DJI gimbal directly onto the tripod, as demonstrated in my video. This little change significantly enhances its portability.This might be on the heavier side, if you are planning to take it for travelling, but that's okay with me... A trade-off I'm willing to take for its sturdiness and reliability. As of now, I haven't discovered any flaws with this tripod. It's a high-quality, budget-friendly option that I recommend to anyone who enjoys filming content.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this tripod! Has very sturdy legs and easy to operate. It can extend really high as well. Has lots of little extras like, remote button, nice carry handle and a hook to hang bag on. The case is really nice and roomy, and made of really good thick material that appears water resistant. Which is nice in the rain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I'm Somewhat Disappointed
reviews.reviewText: The second main reason I purchased this product was the description indicating its heavy duty construction (the price is implied, of course). However, I used it today along with my new Klein Self Leveling Laser & Plumb, and I have to say, it is nicely built, but I don't think this tripod is meant for heavy duty... well, I guess "youget what what you pay for..." I just feel a little deceived with the description 🤷‍♂️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My First Impression
reviews.reviewText: 1. Very nice tripod, but I was disappointed in the actual product when compared to online video reviews and photos.2. This does support my Canon EOS camera and lens that weighs about 5 lbs. and is far less than the 15 pound weight limit for this tripod.3. I was under the impression this was more heavy duty than it actually is.4. The handle feels very cheap but works.5. The leg extension locks are very secure6. Of course the 3 leg extensions get thinner and thinner as you extend them, but they are much thinner than I expected.7. The features are excellent which include:A. 360 degree rotation. Loosen the large round thumb wheel. Tighten in place when in position.B. The platform plate can be tilted up to 90 degrees. Loosen the "Wing Nut". Tighten to secure position.C. Vertical Rotation/Tilt Up & Down- up to 90 degree angle. Turn the handle counter clockwise. Tighten handle to secure position.D. Quick release mounting plate. You get 2.E. Center column height extension. Loosen large thumb wheel on the top of tripod legs. Raise center post. Tighten to secure position.F. Spring loaded phone/tablet mount.G. A Bluetooth remote shutter control for your phone camera.H. Bubble level window (Very Small)I. Travel /storage bag- Feels like flimsy nylon but is handy and will accommodate the tripod with the handle attached if the mounting head is tilted/ folded in the right position. It will also hold a few accessories.J. You get a 2 year warrantyBOTTOM LINE:For the price of less than $30.00 at the time of this review this is a good bargain and an excellent low cost entry level tripod for beginners or those on a budget. Great for cell phones, tablets, camcorders, SLR cameras and even microphones (with the right adaptor). Weight limit is 15 pounds. I would avoid this for very high end equipment. It still rates 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very, very satisfied. Lots of practical details, lightweight yet robust, the smartphone and tablet holder in the same set is a great idea. Normally I never put 5 stars because there is always room for improvement but at this price it's amazing. I'm thinking of buying another one to have as a reserve or as a gift. Amazon needs more suppliers like that. 👍

Upon initial use, I was pleasantly surprised by the product's stability and durability, especially considering its affordable price. The secure closure of each extension imparts a sense of reliability, and the optimal height, along with the immaculate design and manageable weight, makes it versatile for various settings without posing a burden during transportation.
Great tripod and great price good quality

reviews.reviewTitle: Strong enough for my needs and very lightweight
reviews.reviewText: This is a low cost tripod and weighs very little great for travel. However it is not built like a tank like the all metal tripods. While this product does have metal legs everything else is strong plastic which is why is weighs so little. I like it if I just want carry a light tripod for travel. In my studio I usually go with an all metal tripod instead, just so you know, but those costs a lot more. For the price they ask though, this tripod is definitely worth it and I can recommend it, perfect for travellers with light gear or beginners. Super light to carry. You could mount small mirrorless cameras on it or iphones to vlog yourself. For heavier cameras I recommend an all metal tripod. (or both as I did).
This camera tripod is awesome, it's well made and stronger than expected! i will buy again, thanks!

I purchased this for my cameras as well as my laser levels. It works great for both. Folds into three sections, is light, sturdy and I like the colour too. The legs are "quick release" which makes each easy to lengthen and shorten quickly. The ends of the legs have a thick rubber soul which gives them traction on smooth surfaces.
